__e: Your Excellency, I swear I do not know!
I'm sorry, Your Excellency. I was thinking about something else.
I really did want to see you first, Your Excellency, because I wanted to get a little extra time with you.
In reply, Your Excellency... Our young boss has been away on travels for over half a year
His magnificence, the king, actually spoke to me.
Your Excellency, the Fuhrer himself told me...
Where is he? My lord is in the castle!
Excellency, I have decoded Alessandro Farnese's latest letter.
The sergeant's correct again, Your Excellency, there can only be one chain of command.
It must be very urgent, your Excellency, he's waited for more than an hour.
